name: Mitchell Munoz
label: Software Developer
summary: Software developer with strong experience in Python, Flask, Django, and Pygame. Skilled in backend development, system administration, and deploying applications to production environments. Experienced in relational databases, containerization, and CI/CD workflows, with hands-on use of AWS and Raspberry Pi for deployment and experimentation.

projects.title: Flask Blog Application
projects.summary: Built and deployed a production-ready blog application by completing Miguel Grinberg’s Flask Mega-Tutorial, focusing on backend development, database design, authentication, and deployment pipelines.
highlights: Developed Flask-based web application with Jinja2 templates and user authentication
Implemented relational database schema and migrations using SQLAlchemy and Alembic
Wrote automated unit tests to validate application routes and database operations
Integrated external services for email notifications and user avatars (Gravatar)
Containerized the application with Docker and deployed to production using uWSGI behind Nginx
Configured GitHub Actions for continuous integration and deployment workflows

projects.title: Django Blog Application
projects.summary: Built a blog platform by completing Corey Schafer’s Django tutorials, focusing on Django’s built-in features and ORM.
highlights: Developed full-stack blog application using Django’s class-based views, templates, and URL routing
Implemented user registration, login/logout, and password reset with Django’s authentication system
Integrated Crispy Forms and Bootstrap to improve form handling and UI
Created relational database models and managed schema changes with Django migrations
Configured static and media file handling for user profile images
Leveraged Django signals to automate user profile creation and updates

projects.title: Pygame 2D Runner
projects.summary: Built a complete 2D runner game using Pygame with object-oriented programming principles.
highlights: Implemented object-oriented sprite handling, collision detection, animations, and game state management
Added audio integration and refined event loop for smooth gameplay

projects.title: Nuxt Frontend Exploration
projects.summary: Experimented with Nuxt.js to build simple frontend components integrated with backend APIs.
highlights: Created responsive UI components using Vue/Nuxt
Connected frontend to Flask backend for API testing

projects.title: Raspberry Pi Deployments
projects.summary: Deployed small-scale projects to Raspberry Pi devices, experimenting with lightweight hosting and IoT integrations.
highlights: Configured Raspberry Pi OS and deployed Flask/Django projects locally
Explored GPIO and peripheral integration for basic hardware control

work_experience.summary: Managed and maintained the church’s computer networks, software, and technology infrastructure.
highlights: Built and launched website
Solved daily tech challenges

volunteer_experience.summary: Helped serve with any computer problems for two hours each week. Mainly assisted with networking, typing, basic instruction, and troubleshooting.
